menuSignal.title: A Taste of Legacy
menuSignal.description: Our chef curates a dynamic experience honoring Georgian traditions while embracing refined culinary techniques.

atmosphere.title: Our Atmosphere
atmosphere.subtitle: Where Space Meets Sensation
atmosphere.description: Immerse yourself in an environment designed to stimulate every sense. Our dining room blends modern elegance with timeless Georgian warmth, creating the perfect backdrop for extraordinary culinary moments.
atmosphere.photoText1: Every detail is crafted for your perfect evening.
atmosphere.photoText2: We create a special mood for you—not just with our interior or dishes, but with the very address itself.

taste.title: Taste of Georgia
taste.body: Chero is where tradition doesn’t pose — it simply works.

highlights.title: Tonight’s highlights
highlights.hint: A short story for every dish — at a glance.

adjaruli.name: Adjaruli Khachapuri
adjaruli.story: Boat-shaped, sea-ready comfort: cheese, butter, egg — born for the Black Sea coast.

khinkali.name: Khinkali
khinkali.story: Mountain logic: hot broth inside a dumpling — hold the top, sip first, then bite.

mtsvadi.name: Mtsvadi
mtsvadi.story: Char, smoke, and patience — the simplest ritual that never stopped working in Georgia.

final.line:
The door is open.
The rest is simple.
final.body: Experience a culinary journey where every detail is crafted for the senses. From the salt-kissed breezes of the Black Sea to the meticulously aged Georgian wines, every moment at Kobuleti is a testament to the art of fine dining.
